reporter_caption.center: CITY AND COUNTY OF DENVER v. REIFSCHNEIDER, 932 P.2d 810 (Colo. 1997)

caption.center: CITY AND COUNTY OF DENVER, Petitioner, v. ALBERT REIFSCHNEIDER; and
concerning John Gehlhausen, P.C., John Gehlhausen, and Darla Scranton

opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER OF COURT [2] Upon consideration of the Record on Appeal, together with the Written and Oral Arguments of Counsel, and now being sufficiently advised in the premises,
[3] IT IS THIS DAY ORDERED that the Writ of Certiorari heretofore granted be, and is, DENIED as having been improvidently granted.
